Hi, I'm Rohan Rathod!

I love creating responsive, user-friendly, and dynamic websites.

About Me

Hi, I'm Rohan, a passionate Front-End Developer with a deep interest in creating clean, efficient, and user-friendly websites and web applications. I have a strong focus on responsive design, ensuring that my work looks great on any device, from desktops to mobile phones.

With expertise in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React, I specialize in transforming complex ideas into interactive and intuitive web experiences. I am driven by the challenge of improving usability, speed, and performance while maintaining clean, maintainable code.

Whether it's building a fully-fledged web application or enhancing the design of a website, I aim to create solutions that help users navigate effortlessly and efficiently. I thrive in collaborative environments and constantly seek to learn and grow as a developer.

My Services

HTML

HTML (HyperText Markup Language) is the standard language used to structure and display content on the web.

CSS

CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is used to style HTML elements, controlling layout, colors, fonts, and overall presentation of a webpage.

JavaScript

JavaScript is a versatile scripting language used to create dynamic and interactive web applications.

React

React is a powerful JavaScript library for building dynamic and interactive user interfaces efficiently using reusable components.

UI/UX Design

Crafting seamless and visually engaging user experiences that delight and inspire users on websites and applications.

AI

Transforming ideas into innovation, intelligence, and endless possibilities using AI-driven solutions.
